'''Intact Key''' is an item obtained while solving the puzzles of [["Seiraimaru"]] in [[Seirai Island]]. It can be found inside a [[Common Chest]] near the third mechanism puzzle. It is used to unlock the door to be able to follow the [[Seelie]].
